entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -11.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
